snippet: This invigorating show proves that it is pleasing to see artists talking back to the soul-insulting banality of conventional advertising.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews Detournement: Signs of the Times exhibit of various artists at Jonathan LeVine gallery.
lead_paragraph: This invigorating show proves that it is pleasing to see artists talking back to the soul-insulting banality of conventional advertising.

headline.seo: ‘Signs of the Times,’ at Jonathan LeVine
